医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新策略有可能控制 MAPK4 促进的三阴性乳腺癌生长2022 年，贝勒医学院的一组研究人员发现，一种鲜为人知的酶 MAPK4 与三阴性乳腺癌 (TNBC) 的生长及其对某些疗法的耐药性有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Novel-strategy-can-pottially-control-MAPK4-promoted-growth-in-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Novel-strategy-can-潜在-控制-MAPK4-promoted-growth-in-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e33e2fed-3d52-40f3-9f62-55ffefec7022 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 21:03:22 -0400 Novel strategy can potentially control MAPK4-promoted growth in triple negative breast cancer
研究人员开发出检测与精神分裂症相关的大脑变化的新方法佐治亚州立大学 TReNDS 中心的科学家领导的新研究发现，与年龄相关的大脑模式变化与患精神分裂症的风险相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Researchers-develop-new-way-to-detect-brain-changes-linked-with-schizophrenia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Researchers-develop-new-way-to-detect-brain-changes-linked-with-schizophrenia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ea4cda7-e2e0-4a1f-8cf5-c3ff98263575 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 20:32:45 -0400 Researchers develop new way to detect brain changes associated with schizophrenia
研究表明，不孕可能是某些更年期症状的危险因素并非所有女性都会以同样的方式经历更年期。更年期症状的严重程度受到多种行为、生物、社会、心理和人口因素的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Infertility-may-be-a-risk-factor-for-some-menopause-symptoms-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Infertility-may-be-a-risk-factor-for-some-menopause-symptoms-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7f0b582-cee5-4077-95ff-7cb9aa0c7f4c Wed, 02 Aug 2023 20:28:36 -0400 Infertility may be a risk factor for some menopause symptoms, study suggests
新药有望治疗慢性神经性疼痛威尔康奈尔医学院和伯克神经学研究所的研究人员进行的一项临床前研究显示，一种非阿片类药物设计分子通过镇静周围神经系统中过度活跃的疼痛感觉神经元来治疗慢性神经性疼痛，该分子在临床前研究中取得了有希望的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/New-drug-shows-promise-for-treating-chronic-neuropathic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/New-drug-shows-promise-for-treating-chronic-neuropathic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50b4ab22-6fd1-488e-94c3-6004498d62bf Wed, 02 Aug 2023 20:23:25 -0400 New drug shows promise for treating chronic neuropathic pain
基因变异可以解释为什么一些非洲血统的人艾滋病病毒载量较低一个国际研究小组发现了一种基因变异，可以解释为什么一些非洲血统的人体内的艾滋病病毒载量自然较低，从而降低了他们传播病毒的风险并减缓了自身疾病的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Genetic-variant-may-explain-why-some-people-of-African-ancestry-have-lower-HIV-viral-loads.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Genetic-variant-may-explain-why-some-people-of-African-ancestry-have-lower-HIV-viral-loads.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f57017e-3f0f-4953-b10b-10c0269e6965 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 20:20:44 -0400 Genetic variant may explain why some people of African ancestry have lower HIV viral loads
新药针对癌症中的 EMT，减少转移和化疗耐药性转移和化疗耐药是癌症患者治疗失败和死亡的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/New-drug-targets-EMT-in-cancer-reducing-metastasis-and-resistance-to-chemotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/New-drug-targets-EMT-in-cancer-reducing-metastasis-and-resistance-to-chemotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f5733a2-7076-4b39-8228-c5d06cd10a28 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 20:16:28 -0400 New drug targets EMT in cancer, reducing metastasis and resistance to chemotherapy
Insilico Medicine 利用人工智能发现新型 SIK2 抑制剂Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）是一家临床阶段的端到端生成人工智能（AI）药物发现公司，在多种生成人工智能模型和AlphaFold结构在药物发现的应用方面取得了重大突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Insilico-Medicine-uses-AI-to-discover-novel-SIK2-inhibitors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Insilico-Medicine-uses-AI-to-discover-novel-SIK2-inhibitors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fd866b8-7cf1-4150-a9bf-e143fb302b66 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 13:36:04 -0400 Insilico Medicine uses AI to discover novel SIK2 inhibitors
研究发现，高体重指数会增加乳腺癌患者心脏毒性的风险过去几十年来，哥伦比亚的乳腺癌存活率有了显着提高，但增加患者出现心血管副作用（如心脏毒性）可能性的因素尚不清楚，也没有得到很好的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/High-BMI-increases-risk-of-cardio毒性-in-breast-cancer-病人-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/High-BMI-increases-risk-of-cardio毒性-in-breast-cancer-病人-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5714365b-1f43-401a-ac5c-5855fbd475b8 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 13:29:12 -0400 High BMI increases risk of cardiotoxicity in breast cancer patients, study finds
受免疫系统启发的新型分子可灭活多种病毒众所周知，抗病毒疗法的开发非常困难，因为病毒可以迅速突变而对药物产生耐药性。但是，如果新一代抗病毒药物忽略病毒表面快速突变的蛋白质，而是破坏其保护层呢？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Novel-molecules-inspired-by-the-immune-system-inactivate-several-viruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Novel-molecules-inspired-by-the-immune-system-inactivate-several-viruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcc65503-899b-4b91-96a7-fb003ce1ce37 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 13:13:50 -0400 Novel molecules inspired by the immune system inactivate several viruses
美国心脏协会表彰 2,671 家致力于心血管患者护理的医疗保健组织美国心脏协会是追求更长寿、更健康世界的不懈力量，已认可 2,671 个医疗保健和应急响应组织：比 2022 年增加近 145 个 -；以表彰他们致力于通过基于证据的高效和协调的护理来改善心血管患者的健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/American-Heart-Association-recognizes-2671-health-care-organizations-for-commitment-to-cardioangio-eptic-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/American-Heart-Association-recognizes-2671-health-care-organizations-for-commitment-to-cardioangio-eptic-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0990760b-023d-4c2d-8add-cac8e4ddf6df Wed, 02 Aug 2023 12:58:21 -0400 American Heart Association recognizes 2,671 health care organizations for commitment to cardiovascular patient care
